verse: एषा वै हरेः सर्वेश्वरी सर्वविद्या सनातनी कृष्णप्राणाधिदेवी चेति विविक्ते वेदाः स्तुवन्ति यस्या गतिं ब्रह्मभागा वदन्ति । महिमास्याः स्वायुर्मानेनापि कालेन वक्तुं न चोत्सहे

terms.कृष्णप्राणाधिदेवी: the divine power of Krishna's life force
terms.ब्रह्मभागा: the portions of the Vedic hymns

meaning: Meaning:This verse describes the supreme goddess, the eternal knowledge of everything, and the divine power of Krishna's life force. The Vedas praise this goddess separately, as the portions of the Vedic hymns speak of her nature. I, however, am unable to fully describe her glory, even with the passing of time and with my own life force.
